description: [Water Curupira Pikabot Distribution](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0037) used Curl.exe to download the [Pikabot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1145) payload from an external server, saving the file to the victim machine's temporary directory.(Citation: TrendMicro Pikabot 2024)
